item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 30, 2025 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. JavaScript Temporal Is Coming (167 points | 48 comments)
2. Investigating the case of human nose shape and climate adaptation (80 points | 20 comments)
3. Rust's worst feature (available in Rust nightly) (23 points | 1 comment)

11. An analysis of DeepSeek's R1-Zero and R1 (574 points | 204 comments)

14. Goethe's "Sorcerer's Apprentice" – power over wisdom (33 points | 1 comment)

22. Asteroid Impact on Earth 2032 with Probability 1% and 8Mt Energy (379 points | 277 comments)

24. A major Postgres upgrade with zero downtime (198 points | 56 comments)
25. Parsing PDFs (and more) in Elixir using Rust (147 points | 13 comments)
26. Airflow – Stream media files directly from macOS to AirPlay devices (150 points | 54 comments)
27. OpenAI says it has evidence DeepSeek used its model to train competitor (623 points | 1428 comments)

29. I Told You: Chaos Is Coming (5 points | discuss)
